name: Bonsai Token
description: Bonsai is a DN-404 token on Polygon, airdropped to active profiles across the Lens ecosystem. For a community of builders, explorers, and early adopters of onchain social. DN-404 An experimental, mixed ERC-20 / ERC-721 implementation with native liquidity, fractionalization and unique art. 1 BONSAI NFT is linked to 100.000 $BONSAI Token! (It's up to you whether you want to transfer the Token or the NFT.) LensOpen Actions Any onchain action can be paid for in $BONSAI - directly from a Lens post.
